CONTENT_TYPE_NOT_JSON.message: The content-type header was not specified or is not application/json

UNKNOWN_JSON_PARSING_ERROR.message: An unknown error occurred while parsing JSON

MISSING_JSON_BODY_PARAMS.message: The request body JSON is missing the necessary object properties

INVALID_API_CREATE_PARAMS.message: The provided "title" "author" or "body" parameters are too short or too long or contain invalid characters
